addpermission.name: AddPermission
addpermission.description: Grants permission to add a statement to a topic's access control policy, granting access for the specified AWS accounts to the specified actions

checkifphonenumberisoptedout.name: CheckIfPhoneNumberIsOptedOut
checkifphonenumberisoptedout.description: Grants permission to accept a phone number and indicate whether the phone holder has opted out of receiving SMS messages from your account

confirmsubscription.name: ConfirmSubscription
confirmsubscription.description: Grants permission to verify an endpoint owner's intent to receive messages by validating the token sent to the endpoint by an earlier Subscribe action

createplatformapplication.name: CreatePlatformApplication
createplatformapplication.description: Grants permission to create a platform application object for one of the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM, to which devices and mobile apps may register

createplatformendpoint.name: CreatePlatformEndpoint
createplatformendpoint.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for a device and mobile app on one of the supported push notification services, such as GCM and APNS

createsmssandboxphonenumber.name: CreateSMSSandboxPhoneNumber
createsmssandboxphonenumber.description: Grants permission to add a destination phone number and send a one-time password (OTP) to that phone number for an AWS account

createtopic.name: CreateTopic
createtopic.description: Grants permission to create a topic to which notifications can be published

deleteendpoint.name: DeleteEndpoint
deleteendpoint.description: Grants permission to delete the endpoint for a device and mobile app from Amazon SNS

deleteplatformapplication.name: DeletePlatformApplication
deleteplatformapplication.description: Grants permission to delete a platform application object for one of the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

deletesmssandboxphonenumber.name: DeleteSMSSandboxPhoneNumber
deletesmssandboxphonenumber.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS account's verified or pending phone number

deletetopic.name: DeleteTopic
deletetopic.description: Grants permission to delete a topic and all its subscriptions

getdataprotectionpolicy.name: GetDataProtectionPolicy
getdataprotectionpolicy.description: Grants permission to return the data protection policy of the topic

getendpointattributes.name: GetEndpointAttributes
getendpointattributes.description: Grants permission to retrieve the endpoint attributes for a device on one of the supported push notification services, such as GCM and APNS

getplatformapplicationattributes.name: GetPlatformApplicationAttributes
getplatformapplicationattributes.description: Grants permission to retrieve the attributes of the platform application object for the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

getsmsattributes.name: GetSMSAttributes
getsmsattributes.description: Grants permission to return the settings for sending SMS messages from your account

getsmssandboxaccountstatus.name: GetSMSSandboxAccountStatus
getsmssandboxaccountstatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the sandbox status for the calling account in the target region

getsubscriptionattributes.name: GetSubscriptionAttributes
getsubscriptionattributes.description: Grants permission to return all of the properties of a subscription

gettopicattributes.name: GetTopicAttributes
gettopicattributes.description: Grants permission to return all of the properties of a topic

listendpointsbyplatformapplication.name: ListEndpointsByPlatformApplication
listendpointsbyplatformapplication.description: Grants permission to list the endpoints and endpoint attributes for devices in a supported push notification service, such as GCM and APNS

listoriginationnumbers.name: ListOriginationNumbers
listoriginationnumbers.description: Grants permission to list all origination numbers, and their metadata

listphonenumbersoptedout.name: ListPhoneNumbersOptedOut
listphonenumbersoptedout.description: Grants permission to return a list of phone numbers that are opted out, meaning you cannot send SMS messages to them

listplatformapplications.name: ListPlatformApplications
listplatformapplications.description: Grants permission to list the platform application objects for the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

listsmssandboxphonenumbers.name: ListSMSSandboxPhoneNumbers
listsmssandboxphonenumbers.description: Grants permission to list the calling account's current pending and verified destination phone numbers

listsubscriptions.name: ListSubscriptions
listsubscriptions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the requester's subscriptions

listsubscriptionsbytopic.name: ListSubscriptionsByTopic
listsubscriptionsbytopic.description: Grants permission to return a list of the subscriptions to a specific topic

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list all tags added to the specified Amazon SNS topic

listtopics.name: ListTopics
listtopics.description: Grants permission to return a list of the requester's topics

optinphonenumber.name: OptInPhoneNumber
optinphonenumber.description: Grants permission to opt in a phone number that is currently opted out, which enables you to resume sending SMS messages to the number

publish.name: Publish
publish.description: Grants permission to send a message to all of a topic's subscribed endpoints

putdataprotectionpolicy.name: PutDataProtectionPolicy
putdataprotectionpolicy.description: Grants permission to allow a topic owner to set the data protection policy

removepermission.name: RemovePermission
removepermission.description: Grants permission to remove a statement from a topic's access control policy

setendpointattributes.name: SetEndpointAttributes
setendpointattributes.description: Grants permission to set the attributes for an endpoint for a device on one of the supported push notification services, such as GCM and APNS

setplatformapplicationattributes.name: SetPlatformApplicationAttributes
setplatformapplicationattributes.description: Grants permission to set the attributes of the platform application object for the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

setsmsattributes.name: SetSMSAttributes
setsmsattributes.description: Grants permission to set the default settings for sending SMS messages and receiving daily SMS usage reports

setsubscriptionattributes.name: SetSubscriptionAttributes
setsubscriptionattributes.description: Grants permission to allow a subscription owner to set an attribute of the topic to a new value

settopicattributes.name: SetTopicAttributes
settopicattributes.description: Grants permission to allow a topic owner to set an attribute of the topic to a new value

subscribe.name: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Grants permission to prepare to subscribe an endpoint by sending the endpoint a confirmation message

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to the specified Amazon SNS topic

unsubscribe.name: Unsubscribe
unsubscribe.description: Grants permission to delete a subscription

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified Amazon SNS topic

verifysmssandboxphonenumber.name: VerifySMSSandboxPhoneNumber
verifysmssandboxphonenumber.description: Grants permission to verify a destination phone number with a one-time password (OTP) for an AWS account
